# Introduction

I am using a personalized CSS file instead of the `default-page.css` file (but I copied a lot from the original). I added a class called `break-before-me` that I am using to force page break before a section when the class is added with `{.break-before-me}` just after the title. In the CSS, I wrote :

```
.break-before-me {
  break-before: page;
}
```

This works well but the issue is that the TOC is not updated. In this reprex, we can see that in the TOC, the section titles of level 2 have the same page number but there are not on the same page in the document because of the forced page break. I can't find how to fix this.

NB : internal link in the TOC are working well
